data.title: Pistons to celebrate 20th anniversary of 2004 championship team in March
data.meta_description: The Detroit Pistons will celebrate the 20th anniversary of the 2004 NBA championship team that defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 4-1 in the NBA Finals, delivering the franchise its third NBA title. All members of the 2004 team are expected to be in attendance.
data.text:
The Detroit Pistons are currently enduring one of the worst seasons in franchise history, but next month could prove to be a bright spot, giving fans something to look forward to.

On Monday, the team announced a special game-day recognition of the 20th anniversary of their 2004 team that defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 4-1 in the 2004 NBA Finals, delivering the franchise its third NBA title. The celebration will take place during the Pistonsâ€™ home game on Sunday, Mar. 17, at Little Caesars Arena against the Miami Heat. Tipoff is set for 3 p.m.
